desc.d: Donations supports are welcome, but they are not obligatory. Want to use only for free? Of course, you can. Thats what I made this project for. But if you want to thank me for what I do. If you want get access to the latest updates and other stuff. Go to my page Patreon.com/lukazuki, select the right tier, and enjoy expanded content.
